DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , randomize , multi-center , open-label trial HeartMate PHP 100 site US . Control device Abiomed Impella device approve use high-risk PCI . Nonrandomized roll-in phase : Each site must first enroll treat 6 patient ( 3 PHP 3 Impella per site ) Randomized phase : Up 425 patient undergoing PCI per Inclusion/Exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Patient undergoing elective urgent high risk PCI procedure hemodynamically stable Patient indicate revascularization least one de novo restenotic lesion native coronary vessel bypass graft A heart team , include cardiac surgeon , determine high risk PCI acceptable therapeutic option The presence complex coronary artery disease ( CAD ) make hemodynamic instability result repeat episode reversible myocardial ischemia PCI likely . Complex CAD define : ejection fraction ≤35 % AND least one following : intervention last patent coronary conduit , OR intervention unprotected leave main artery , OR intervention patient present triple vessel disease define least one significant stenosis ( least 50 % diameter stenosis visual assessment ) three major epicardial territory Written , sign , date informed consent • Emergency PCI Any prior coronary revascularization within last six month Myocardial infarction baseline define : ST Elevation MI ( STEMI ) : Subject clinical symptom and/or ECG change ( new pathological Q wave 2 contiguous lead ) consistent acute ST elevation MI ( STEMI ) within 72 hour prior index procedure . NonSTEMI : Hemodynamically unstable biomarker elevation ( CKMB Troponin > 1x URL ) and/or evidence least 1 consecutive troponin CKMB value trend downward previous value .
